explains: n. 引文，引语；传唤，传票；表彰，嘉奖状；引用，引证
wordGroup: citation index 引文索引；引证索引
science citation index 科学文献索引

sentences.en: The court could issue a citation and fine Ms. Robbins.
sentences.cn: 法庭可以发出传票并且罚罗宾斯女士的款。

sentences.en: Studies of citation counts show that international co-authored papers have better visibility.
sentences.cn: 对被引频次的研究表明，国际合作的论文具有更好的知名度。

sentences.en: Space does not permit the citation of the examples.
